document.title: SP418-N-Healthy Children: 1 Year Old

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: BOTH you and your baby have come a long way. Youâ€™ve helped your baby grow into someone who can sit, stand, climb and reach for things; who can think, feel, understand you and maybe even say a few words. You can look back with pride on the past year and give yourself a well deserved pat on the back. At times it was hard, but you managed well. From now on, your baby will be growing and learning at an amazing rate. You can look forward to the coming years, confident that you will help him develop into a responsible human being.
